data.message: KIAORA Eminem, mannn shit just hit the roof!! If what we hear is true about Eminem and his peeps sueing National Party NZ and PM John Key of NZ for using eminems song "Lose yourself"fah I hope it is true and I pray that you take John key the Greedy cunt down cause theirs a lot of Hate against John Key and His stupid arse national party because their beliefs are "Make the Rich richer & the poor and under average paid earners suffer" and thats why we need that idiot John key the fuck outta Prime Minister, he needs to be GONE!! Theirs a Good New Zealand man the has a good heart for our people and he is the ONE for Prime Minister His name is "David Cuncliff" he is next in line for Prime Minister but its been a hard battle trying to Kick John Key out as PM and 20th September is the closing time for Election so heres to Having a New PM and See yah later John key you greedy shit!!! THANK YOU EMINEM Mad Respect From Myself and our good people Here in NZ!!!!
